content: वृषभः [वृस्-अभच् किच्च] {@--1@} A bull. {@--2@} Any male animal. {@--3@} Anything best or eminent of its class (at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>); द्विजवृषभः <ls>Ratn. 1. 5</ls>, <ls n="Ratn.">4. 21.</ls> {@--4@} The sign {%Taurus%} of the zodiac. {@--5@} A kind of drug; <ab>cf.</ab> ऋषभ. {@--6@} An elephant's ear. {@--7@} The orifice or hollow of the ear.
